artist: Manufacturer: attributed to Minton's Pottery and Porcelain Factory
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
description: decorated with English views taken from paintings of English historical scenes; light blue transfers picture different scenes with the name of the scene on the reverse side; sometimes the wrong name identifies the picture; two pieces do not have names; large tureen cover pictures a windmill and fishermen; butter boat displays a small building
markings: various marks on bottom of most pieces; \'Mintons\', bottom of .7 (Meat dish)
object_name: Cheese Plate, from a Child's Dinner Set
title: Cheese Plate, from a Child's Dinner Set
